title: 求助! 一进服务器就崩溃..
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Ticking screen

A full error report has been saved to E:\MC二周目\MC客户端二周目\MC客户端二周目\client\.minecraft\crash-

reports\crash-2013-05-31_18.22.08-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if 

you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.author: Citero
replies.txt_content: mod有问题 要是你进别人的服务器去重下下

Citero 发表于 2013-5-31 19:36 
mod有问题 要是你进别人的服务器去重下下
哦. 服务端是我自己整合的.... 我再看看哪里出错了

Citero 发表于 2013-5-31 19:36 
mod有问题 要是你进别人的服务器去重下下
重新弄了次还是不行.. 纠结啊
